name: FindMyFrogs!
description:
findmyfrogs! is an extremely small but aesthetically pleasing game beatable in under 5 minutes. 

You are sleeping on a bench, as usual (because you're homeless) when suddenly you are awoken by a stranger. She has lost her frogs and needs a brave, courageous man such as yourself to help find them. but your character will only do it under one condition: that she dates him after fulfilling her request. You must find her 10 frogs otherwise your long lost dream of touching a female will be destroyed. Happy searching...
